reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Learning the experience of Finland on quota for women in elected bodies lobbying quota for women and preparation of the women candidates

description.narrative: The project goal is to protect the rights of women in different state bodies. There are only 20 women out of the 125 members in the Parliament of Azerbaijan. Women from political parties and NGOs will learn about the Finnish quota for women and they will s hare their knowledge in Azerbaijan. The project will also prepare women candidates for the parliamentary elections and train them to carry out their election campaigns. There will be conducted seminars with subjects like: functions of the parliament rights and obligations of the members of the parliament negotiation skills and preparation of speeches.
